articles.title: 'It's not right that you have to rely on Eastern Europe for surgery' - The Irish Times
articles.description: A quarter of Northern Ireland’s population is waiting for a consultant appointment
articles.content: Fearing he risked paralysis waiting on NHS surgery to correct his deformed spine, Kevin McIvor took a gamble. The former joiner left his home and young family in Co Derry last July and headed to Turk… [+10894 chars]

articles.title: Russia's U.N. envoy storms out of Ukraine meeting over European statement - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russia's U.N. Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia stormed out of a U.N. Security Council meeting on Monday as European Council President Charles Michel addressed the 15-member body and accused Moscow of fueling a global food crisis with its invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: UNITED NATIONS, June 6 (Reuters) - Russia's U.N. Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia stormed out of a U.N. Security Council meeting on Monday as European Council President Charles Michel addressed the 15-mem… [+1909 chars]

articles.title: Ryanair forces South Africans to prove nationality with Afrikaans test - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Ryanair said the test would apply to any South African passport holder flying to Britain from another part of Europe
articles.content: Ryanair is requiring South African passengers to prove their nationality before travelling by completing a test in Afrikaans, a language used by just 12 per cent of the population that has long been … [+2646 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox cases may have been spreading undetected in US, Europe for years - Fox News
articles.description: Monkeypox may have been spreading out of Africa for years under the guise of sexually transmitted infections before Western coutnries identified the outbreak in May.
articles.content:
Monkeypox cases may have been spreading out of Africa undetected for years before the initial case was confirmed on May 13, according to the World Health Organization.
